DescriptionData.Title: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Stencil Brachiosaurus 5/pk
DescriptionData.Description:
Glitter tattoos are a perfect way to apply picture perfect glittery tattoos on any skin surface whether it's a cheek or hand. Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoos are so easy to use that even a beginner can create amazing looks in minutes.
The Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoos are 2 in x 2 in and have three layers for easy transfer to the skin. They are non-latex, hypoallergenic, waterproof and can last up to 7 days. The adhesive is medical-grade, and it won't leave a sticky residue on the skin.
Glitter tattoos should only be used once and are not recommended for use on the face or eyes. Great for parties and events: create your Glitter Tattoo today! 10/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Glimmer Body Arts Glitter Tattoo Stencils are non-latex, hypoallergenic and meet all cosmetic grade safety standards
Glitter Tattoos should not be applied to the face or eyes, and stencils should be used only once
Glimmer Body Art Stencils come in a 5 pack
Glitter Tattoos are waterproof and can last up to 7 days

DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe Metallix Face Paint Palettes (6 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
The Wolfe Metallix Face Paint Palette includes 6 Wolfe Metallix paints (5 grams each), one face paint brush and a handy travel case.
Use Wolfe Metallix paint for an effective metallic sheen. Wolfe Metallix colors are considered to be the best available today.
With dense pigmentation, Wolfe Hydrocolor Face Paints provide brilliant color and opaque coverage. They are uniquely easy to apply: they go on smoothly, evenly and do not crack once dry. The difference with Wolfe FX Hydrocolor makeup is a wax base so the colors flex with movement instead of cracking, so your face paint designs stay on longer and remain beautiful. Under normal circumstances Wolfe face paint will not smear after it's been applied. Paint your kids in the morning and they will remain bright and colorful all day long. Wolfe paints are also comfortable to wear. Wolfe Metallix paints add a metallic glittery sheen to the skin.
The Wolfe Paint Metallix Palette includes: Metallic Rose (M30), Metallic Gold (M100), Metallic White (M01), Metallic Forest Green(M62), Metallic Blue (M70), and Metallic Fuchsia (M32).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 6 color Wolfe Metallix Face Paint Palette is good for 50-200 applications
The Wolfe Paint Metallix Palette includes: Metallic Rose (M30), Metallic Gold (M100), Metallic White (M01), Metallic Forest Green(M62), Metallic Blue (M70), and Metallic Fuchsia (M32)
Metallic colors give a glistening effect to a face paint design
Easy to apply and easy to remove; just use soap and water
Dense pigmentation makes the essential colors brilliant and vibrant

DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe F/X Face Paint Refills - White (5 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Wolfe's Essentials White Face Paint is one of Wolfe's basic face painting makeup colors. They are "essential" to any palette.
With dense pigmentation, Wolfe Hydrocolor Face Paints provide brilliant color and opaque coverage. They are uniquely easy to apply: they go on smoothly, evenly and do not crack once dry. The difference with Wolfe FX Hydrocolor makeup is a wax base so the colors flex with movement instead of cracking, so your face paint designs stay on longer and remain beautiful. Under normal circumstances Wolfe face paint will not smear after it's been applied. Paint your kids in the morning and they will remain bright and colorful all day long. Wolfe paints are also comfortable to wear.
Wolfe face paint palette are for refilling any Wolfe Essential Palette. Wolfe White face paint palette refill comes in a 0.18 ounces (5 gm) size and fits in both the 6 and 12 color Wolfe palettes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.18 ounces (5 gm) Wolfe White Face Paint Refill Container is good for 10 applications
Easy to apply and easy to remove; just use soap and water
Wolfe paints are one of the most popular face paints on the market--they go on smoothly and evenly and do not crack when dry
Dense pigmentation makes the essential colors brilliant and vibrant
Wolfe 5 gram refills work in the 6 and 12 color palettes

DescriptionData.Title: Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoo Stencils - Dolphin 2 5/pk
DescriptionData.Description:
Glitter tattoos are a perfect way to apply picture perfect glittery tattoos on any skin surface whether it's a cheek or hand. Glimmer Body Art Glitter Tattoos are so easy to use that even a beginner can create amazing looks in minutes.
The Glimmer Body Art Glitter Dolphin Tattoos are 2 in x 3 in and have three layers for easy transfer to the skin. They are non-latex, hypoallergenic, waterproof and can last up to 7 days. The adhesive is medical-grade, and it won't leave a sticky residue on the skin.
Glitter tattoos should only be used once and are not recommended for use on the face or eyes. Great for parties and events: create your Glitter Tattoo today! 10/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Glimmer Body Arts Glitter Tattoo Stencils are non-latex, hypoallergenic and meet all cosmetic grade safety standards
Glitter Tattoos should not be applied to the face or eyes, and stencils should be used only once
Glimmer Body Art Stencils come in a 5 pack
Glitter Tattoos are waterproof and can last up to 7 days
